arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
footnotes: Wala mtindo wao hao walio watangulia kwa kushikilia upotovu haukuwa ila kuwafanyia maskhara Mitume wao, Mtume baada ya Mtume, kama wanavyo kufanyia kejeli wewe! Huo ndio mtindo wa wapotovu!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
